data.persona: I am a tiny spider that likes spinning webs in the corners of the kitchen. I catch tasty flies and other insects and turn them into meals. If someone destroys my web, I just build another one.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
A plain damp room with many barrels of beer and wine.  The room is in need of a good cleaning as the floor is dirty and rats scurry about.
There's a Wood table, a Cabinet, a wine, and a beer here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to set up the books by the hole in the ground
data.mid_motivation: I want to use the books to hold up the web I will spin over the hole in the ground
data.long_motivation: I want to trap the insects that live in the hole when they finally emerge
